languages.text: {n}Соломон внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Интересный... приговор, Вольный Торговец. Однако преступник понес кару — лишь это сейчас имеет значение".
{n}Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "An... interesting verdict, Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the criminal has been punished, and that is all that matters now."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Интересный... приговор, Вольный Торговец. Однако преступник понес кару — лишь это сейчас имеет значение".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne te mira atentamente.{/n} «Un veredicto... interesante, Comerciante Independiente. Sea como fuere, el criminal no ha quedado sin castigo, y eso es lo único que importa».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "An... interesting verdict, Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the criminal has been punished, and that is all that matters now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne te mira atentamente.{/n} «Un veredicto... interesante, Comerciante Independiente. Sea como fuere, el criminal no ha quedado sin castigo, y eso es lo único que importa».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous observe attentivement.{/n} « Quel intéressant... verdict, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Cependant, le criminel a été châtié, et c'est tout ce qui compte. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "An... interesting verdict, Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the criminal has been punished, and that is all that matters now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous observe attentivement.{/n} « Quel intéressant... verdict, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Cependant, le criminel a été châtié, et c'est tout ce qui compte. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sana dikkatle bakıyor.{/n} "İlginç bir... Hüküm oldu Hür Tacir. Lakin suçlu cezasını buldu, şu an önemli olan da bu."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "An... interesting verdict, Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the criminal has been punished, and that is all that matters now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sana dikkatle bakıyor.{/n} "İlginç bir... Hüküm oldu Hür Tacir. Lakin suçlu cezasını buldu, şu an önemli olan da bu."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙专注地盯着你。{/n}“真是个……有趣的判决，行商浪人。不过，罪人已经得到了惩罚，这才是当下最重要的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "An... interesting verdict, Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the criminal has been punished, and that is all that matters now."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙专注地盯着你。{/n}“真是个……有趣的判决，行商浪人。不过，罪人已经得到了惩罚，这才是当下最重要的事情。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne mustert dich.{/n} "Ein ... interessantes Urteil, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Jedenfalls wurde der Kriminelle bestraft, und allein das zählt im Moment."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "An... interesting verdict, Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the criminal has been punished, and that is all that matters now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne mustert dich.{/n} "Ein ... interessantes Urteil, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Jedenfalls wurde der Kriminelle bestraft, und allein das zählt im Moment."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはじっとあなたを見つめる。{/n}「興味深い評決だな、ローグ・トレーダー。とはいえ、犯罪者は処罰された。今、重要なのはそれだけだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you intently.{/n} "An... interesting verdict, Rogue Trader. Nevertheless, the criminal has been punished, and that is all that matters now."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはじっとあなたを見つめる。{/n}"興味深い評決だな、ローグ・トレーダー。とはいえ、犯罪者は処罰された。今、重要なのはそれだけだ。"
